title: About face
creator_credit: Chris James and Arts Council of Great Britain
brief_description: This film gallops through over 60 facial transformations, including animated caricatures of Mick Jagger, Oscar Wilde, The Queen, The Duke of Edinburgh, Prince Charles, Pablo Picasso, Idi Amin, Salvador Dali, Adolf Hitler, The Marx Brothers, and David Bowie. Music by Claude Jouvin.
